snippet: Simple household objects and precious gold and bejeweled items from the Romanov period will be on exhibit this spring in New York museums.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; Foundation of Russian History's inaugural exhibition The Russian Word and Image: Four Centuries of Books and Art, surveying four centuries of Romanov rule and post-imperial life, opens at Holy Trinity Monastery in Jordanville, NY, in May; Swann Auction Galleries is holding its first sale devoted to vernacular photography in April.
lead_paragraph: Simple household objects and precious gold and bejeweled items from the Romanov period will be on exhibit this spring in New York museums.

headline.main: Treasures and Trivia of the Romanov Era
headline.print_headline: Treasures and Trivia of the Romanov Era
